response.overview: A hymn composed about the internet much how Indian religious poetry gets composed through the process of affective hermeneutics. One's experience of the web becomes a highly spiritual and emotionally driven act. Where the mighty powers of the internet are interpret through emotional praise, exaggeration and personalized narratives. I pray for the daily good morning messages. I pray for the vivid, colorful and corny photos, videos and couplets. I pray to thank the undesigned identities and languages the web makes. May your statuses update eternally.
response.title: The Web Vandana
